General.Name: Tifa Finance Tbk
General.Description: PT KDB Tifa Finance Tbk engages in the investment financing, working capital financing, and multipurpose financing businesses in Indonesia. It operates in three segments: Finance Lease, Multipurpose Financing, and Sharia Financing. The company also offers sharia financing and other financing business activities. It operates branch office in Surabaya; and representative offices in Semarang, Balikpapan, Makassar, and Pekanbaru. The company was formerly known as PT Tifa Finance Tbk and changed its name to PT KDB Tifa Finance Tbk in September 2020. PT KDB Tifa Finance Tbk was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia. PT KDB Tifa Finance Tbk is a subsidiary of Korea Development Bank.
